name: asteroids
description: - src/utils.js contains utility code like vector math. - src/moving_object.js is the base class for anything that moves. - src/asteroid.js containst the actual asteroid stuff. Inherits from MovingObject. - src/bullet.js bullet class, inherits from MovingObject. - src/ship.js ship class, inherits from MovingObject. - src/game.js actually runs the games and keeps track of all the objects in it. - src/game_view.js stores the game and canvas and listeners and timers, basically the interface. # Notes - We weren't allowed to use ES6 syntax for this.
